title: Small Ekko Bug on his Projekt Skin
body:
Played on Patch 8.3 
Date: 14.02.18 
Time: 6 p.m.
Server: EUW

Just played a few ranked-games with Ekko and i chose the projekt skin. I dont knwo if it is caused by the skin or if it is on ekko no matter what, but it seems his running animation when having the homeguard effect or when his movementspeed excells throught other buffs is a little bit bugged.
Its not a major bug it is more or less only visual.
It happens when you exit the really-hight-Movementspeed-Animation, when you usally have the normal walk the champion does on low Movementspeed.
The animation remains and you basicly see him running while only at a basic Movementspeed level. This bug disappears as soon as you stop your champion model with the S key but as long as you dont stop moving the animation remains.
Sorry for not providing footage but since it happened that way 10/10 times i would appreciate if you could adjust this little eyecandy so i dont have to look at my champ doing giant steps while moving at .5 mph ! :D

Thank you for reading and have a nice day

Some name but defenitly not mine
